name: airdrop-viral-app
description: A viral social introduction app leveraging AirDrop for IRL connections

scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d && docker-compose exec app npm run dev
scripts.fresh: npm run setup && npm run migrate:fresh && npm run seed
scripts.setup: npm run build && npm run composer:install && npm run npm:install && npm run key:generate
scripts.migrate: docker-compose exec app php artisan migrate
scripts.migrate:fresh: docker-compose exec app php artisan migrate:fresh
scripts.seed: docker-compose exec app php artisan db:seed
scripts.key:generate: docker-compose exec app php artisan key:generate
scripts.tinker: docker-compose exec app php artisan tinker
scripts.test: docker-compose exec app php artisan test
scripts.queue: docker-compose exec app php artisan queue:work
scripts.cache:clear: docker-compose exec app php artisan cache:clear
scripts.db:shell: docker-compose exec db psql -U airdrop_user -d airdrop_viral
scripts.prod:build: docker-compose exec app npm run build
scripts.prod:deploy: echo 'Run deployment script for your cloud provider'
